name: Infoblox BloxOne
description: This plugin is used to fetch applications data from **Monitor > Reports > Security > Application Discovery > All Applications** and devices from **Configure > Security > Endpoints** page of the Infoblox BloxOne platform. This plugin supports performing Update application status action on the applications and doesn't support any action on the devices.

configuration.label: Base URL
configuration.description: API Base URL of Infoblox BloxOne instance. e.g. https://csp.infoblox.com

configuration.label: API Key
configuration.description: API Key generated from the Infoblox BloxOne instance. API Key can be generated from 'Profile > User API Keys' page.
